nodes.text: The Haldeen sector was a sector where a damaged Star Destroyer of the Galactic Empire limply traveled for a number weeks in the subsequent weeks of the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. The New Republic's Hail Squadron were sent to chase down the Star Destroyer, with the assistance of the New Republic's Alphabet Squadron. Together, the squadrons managed to take down the starship.
The Haldeen sector first appeared in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, written by Alexander Freed.
